subject: algorithm developer: optimization
content: dorabot is expanding and hiring for new positions! join us in revolutionizing robotics by applying cutting-edge technology to real world scenarios.  *algorithm developer: optimization  * responsibilities: 1.     analyse problems, formalize given problems as a well-defined optimization problem and design algorithms accordingly. the problem domains include but not limited to layout design, scheduling, task allocation, and packing. 2.     (advanced) customize and implement optimization algorithms into an integrated robotics system. 3.     (advanced) perform theoretical analysis of algorithms. the analysis will be on convergence, completeness, and approximation factors.    requirements: 1.     bachelor or higher degree in one of the following areas (specified in descending order of preferences): a.     optimisation b.     operations research c.     machine learning or actuarial studies 2.     has a solid understanding of basic optimization techniques? 3.     proficient in one of the following computing languages (specified in descending order of preferences): a.     c/c++ b.     python/scheme c.     matlab/r 4.     (bonus) has expertise in combinatorial optimization and/or black-box optimization 5.     (bonus) mathematical modelling. the capability of formalizing a problem to (alphabetical ordering): a.     decision problem b.     numerical optimization problem (e.g., integer/quadratic/convex programming) c.     other standard formalization. here?s a bit about our company: dorabot is an ai and robotics company developing loading, sorting, induction, and transportation solutions for market-leading logistics companies in the us and china. headquartered in shenzhen and backed by some of china's most prominent tech magnates, we're a tight-knit team of visionaries that live and breathe robotics. as e-commerce has exploded, order fulfillment still largely depends on traditional resources. dorabot's advanced solutions allow express couriers to automate, keep up with increasing demand, and fully embrace the future. unique among early-stage chinese startups, dorabot employs people from over 10 different countries and views diversity as a key to their success. among dorabot?s employees are former ups executives and amazon robotics challenge champions from germany and australia. dorabot is currently piloting sorting solutions in the us, which will be rolled out to additional facilities in 2019, followed by our loading and transportation systems. our website: www.dorabot.com what we offer:  -a competitive salary and company equity based on experience and personal contributions -an amazing opportunity to experience life in shenzhen, widely known as china?s silicon valley. shenzhen has the best air quality of any major city in china! -free chinese lessons -free lunches and fresh fruit -an international workplace where english is our working language -on-site company gym -plenty of resources to purchase all kinds of equipment for research and development *dorabot videos:* dorabot solution compilation video - https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__youtu.be_3-2dr9gbgq-2dds&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=kgrhwodzsadebg_kjfkvzm0ph6tuzffhnjj6b0d6v9a&s=x1fxg1pf-nscyxcv5drv7ffyhza6uhtpxlzp7iitv_g&e= a short video we put together showcasing our various solutions and technologies for dhl?s robotics day event in germany. dorabot rewind 2018: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__www.youtube.com_watch-3fv-3dzop88u-2dnrlk&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=kgrhwodzsadebg_kjfkvzm0ph6tuzffhnjj6b0d6v9a&s=l9nev45wmqclayxab0gwqsu3x_6ktowocav2awbqjae&e= -- sent from: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__robotics-2dworldwide.1046236.n5.nabble.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=kgrhwodzsadebg_kjfkvzm0ph6tuzffhnjj6b0d6v9a&s=w3tjbgffbrkxmse2s4fhyzjvzd78ria_oybdsdjfb9s&e=

subject: post-doc position in driving styles of  autonomous vehicles @ chalmers,  sweden
content: dear madam/sir, could you please post this announcement to the robotics-world-wide newsletter: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ postdoctoral position in driving styles of autonomous vehicles in mixed traffic conditions the department of mechanics and maritime sciences (m2) conducts fundamental and applied research in all modes of transport to achieve sustainable technological solutions. m2 holds one of  sweden ?s most extensive simulator centre for navigation and propulsion of ships, as well as world class laboratories within combustion engineering and wind tunnels. the department also offers and contributes to bachelor and master programs in areas such as shipping, automotive and mechanical engineering to mention a few. in addition, professional education is performed on both a national and international level, with specific designed mission training for different social actors, within our ambition for a lifelong learning. the department continuously strives to establish a cooperation between academia, industry, and society, with a great focus on utilization. m2 is characterized by an international environment with employees and students from around the world, as well as outstanding research and world class education. m2 consists of seven different divisions within the areas of engineering and maritime sciences, and one division of administration and support. *information about the research group*we welcome applications for a postdoctoral position for a research topic on automated driving and mixed traffic conditions. this multi-disciplinary research will be performed together with other partners from  sweden  and china. the successful candidate will be part of crash analysis and prevention group within the vehicle safety division. the researchers in this group conduct world-leading research on topics ranging from normal driving behaviour to the events leading to on-road crashes and incidents. additional research addresses the development of methods to assess the safety impact of in-vehicle active safety systems. much of our research involves the analysis of quantitative data collected naturalistically. that is, data collected from road users in their daily routines. these data and their analysis are often used as a basis for controlled experiments, mathematical simulations and driver modelling. the division is physically located at safer vehicle and traffic safety centre at chalmers and utilises this central positioning to collaborate with other safer partners. safer's partners include prominent swedish universities, research institutes, government agencies, and supporting industries. this enables access to advanced driving simulators and full scale vehicle testing environments. *major responsibilities*the successful candidate will be part of vehicle safety division and one of two postdocs working in  sweden -china collaboration projects. you are responsible for developing mathematical models representing driving styles of vehicles with different automation levels. these models may range from control-theoretic models to hybrid automata of a stochastic/probabilistic nature. you are also responsible for creating tools (e.g., extensions or necessary plug-ins to microscopic simulation software) and adapting/developing new measures to address both safety and efficiency. these models, tools, and measures will provide the necessary basis to study the impact of mixed traffic on traffic safety and traffic flow. you will have access to naturalistic driving databases for validation of your models involving no automation. beside conducting the research, the responsibilities of the successful candidate include communicating the results of the research verbally and in writing (i.e., publishing papers), and contributing to proposals writing. *position summary*the position is full-time temporary employment and is limited to a maximum of two years with a performance review after 1 year. *qualifications*the candidate must have a phd degree, obtained in the last three years, in a relevant field such as engineering (e.g., computer, mechanical, electrical, physic), computer science, mathematics, or statistics. experiences in analysis of time-series data, signal processing, and ability to program are required (at least in matlab; ability to program in other languages like c, r, python are advantageous). experiences with applying machine learning, control algorithms, stochastic and probabilistic methods for real-world problems as well as experience with coding and setting up microscopic traffic simulation (e.g., sumo, vissim, aimsun) are advantageous. ability to initiate new research collaborations is essential. good collaboration and communication skills in oral and written english are required. we welcome candidates that are self propelled, culturally aware, and quality conscious. the position will require international travel to china which requires entry visas. *chalmers continuously strives to be an attractive employer. equality and diversity are substantial foundations in all activities at chalmers.* *our offer to you* chalmers offers a cultivating and inspiring working environment in the dynamic city of gothenburg <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__international.goteborg.se_&d=dwmfaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=-jqpbxjsyiiq5j9qjstyibmhh_2wrl3oqg7rhbcpboo&s=kewyirmq4styaqyr86ciasmjdjtidossewmjpvwiuk0&e=> . read more about working at chalmers <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__www.chalmers.se_en_about-2dchalmers_working-2dat-2dchalmers_pages_default.aspx&d=dwmfaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=-jqpbxjsyiiq5j9qjstyibmhh_2wrl3oqg7rhbcpboo&s=_p4reofui5kks4h8ft7vhvc_r59cd14zkyd0ycxayvi&e=> and our benefits subject: postdoctoral position in university of  science and technology beijing, china
content: postdoctoral position in university of science and technology beijing, china the school of automation and electrical engineering, university of science and technology beijing, china seeks to fill postdoctoral positions as soon as possible. we are interested in candidates in broad areas of control engineering, artificial intelligence (ai), unmanned autonomous systems, etc.   application conditions are as follows:   - phd degree - good experience in theory and/or engineering research - good communication skills in english and/or chinese - strong work ethics and passion for research   salary and other: - rmb 300k each year (rmb 1 = usd 0.15) - subsidized apartment (affordable rent) - it is a 2 year position and can be extended to 5 years   required documents: - detailed curriculum vitae and a list of publications   for further information, please contact prof. dr. okyay kaynak, email : okyay.kaynak at boun.edu.tr

subject: young 1000 plan professor position in  university of science and technology beijing, china
content: the school of automation and electrical engineering, university of science and technology beijing, china seeks to fill young 1000 plan professor positions as soon as possible. we are interested in candidates in broad areas of control engineering, artificial intelligence (ai), unmanned autonomous systems, etc.   application conditions are as follows: - below the age of 40; - phd degree, plus over 3 years overseas research experience; - the applicant is taking a formal teaching/research position in a well-known research institution or the research department of a well-known enterprise, when application is filed; - the applicant shall work full time in china when successfully selected into the program; if the applicant has already been working in china for some time, the working time is no more than 1 year; - the applicant has outstanding performance in the field compared to his/her age group, and has the potential to become a field leader; - special considerations will be given to the applicant who has already made extraordinary achievements.   salary and others: - one-time personal monetary subsidy of rmb 500,000 (tax-free, rmb 1= usd 0.15) - annual salary of no less than rmb 400,000; - national research fund of rmb 1m to 3m, plus a 1:1 matching university fund as research start-up;   required documents - detailed curriculum vitae and list of publications;   for further information, please contact prof. dr. okyay kaynak, email: okyay.kaynak at boun.edu.tr <mailto:okyay.kaynak at boun.edu.tr> .

subject: multiple postdoc openings in surgical  robotics at the chinese university of hong kong, hong kong
content: multiple postdocs (basic qualification: phd) and research associates (basic qualification: master?s + at least 4 years research experiences) openings are currently available in surgical robotics and devices laboratory in the department of mechanical and automation engineering at the chinese university of hong kong, led by professor shing shin cheng. the multiple posts will last for either 12 months or 18 months, subject to mutual agreement. we are seeking strong candidates who have background in any of the following research areas: robotics, mechanical design, modeling/simulation, control, smart actuators, planning and navigation, perception, and system integration. preferences will be given to those who have experiences in surgical robotics, soft robotics, and medical imaging-related research. the appointee will be expected to conduct high impact and potentially technology translatable research related to surgical robotics. he/she will assist the pi in supporting multiple research projects. post-docs/research associates should, by the beginning of their contracts, (i) have the basic qualifications mentioned above in mechanical engineering, electrical and computer engineering, biomedical engineering or related engineering disciplines; (ii) have strong publication records in high impact factor journals; (iii) demonstrate effective written and spoken english. experience collaborating with clinical personnel would be an advantage. the contract will start in early august 2019. before the contract starts, the processing time for visa and document preparation is 4 weeks for hong kong locals and 3 months for non-locals. salary will be highly competitive and commensurate with qualifications and experience. closing date: 20 april 2019 or until the vacancies are filled. application procedure: interested candidates should send via email a detailed cv, list of publications, and preferably a support letter from your phd/master?s advisor to: sscheng at cuhk.edu.hk<mailto:sscheng at cuhk.edu.hk>. feel free to email me with any other queries. shing shin cheng, phd assistant professor department of mechanical and automation engineering the chinese university of hong kong shatin, new territories, hong kong email: sscheng at cuhk.edu.hk<mailto:sscheng at cuhk.edu.hk> tel: +(852) 3943 9487

subject: internship at bosch corporate research  asia-pacific (shanghai)
content: dear colleagues, we are looking to fill a six months? internship position in the field of mobile robotics, computer vision, and sensor fusion for industry 4.0. about us bosch research and technology centre asia pacific harbors an international team of interdisciplinary scientists, driving research in several focus fields to leverage on asia?s best-in-class expertise for future innovations and technology. we put in place beneficial products addressing crucial needs to improve the life of people in asia. we are offering a six months? internship position at corporate research in shanghai. be part of a research team, and play an important role in innovating and developing solutions for mobile robotics and industry automation! job responsibility ?            review project requirements, survey available technologies, and check feasibility regarding requirements and resources ?            design and implement algorithms for robot localization and mapping through sensor fusion (visual slam, imu, etc.) ?            create environment models and reconstructions from 2-d/3-d sensor data ?            integrate algorithms into existing robotics platform and perform real-world testing ?            fulfill the project goals timely and with quality ?            document processes and results during development, especially for the key milestones ?            work pro-actively within team to feedback processes and problems timely, and to discuss and find solutions knowledge competencies and attributes required: ?            major in computer science, software engineering, robotics, ai, electronic engineering, or relevant technical background ?            solid knowledge in image or digital signal processing ?            experience with rgb and/or 3d cameras and sensor data processing ?            good c/c++ and/or python programming skills ?            good communication skills to work in an international team ?            proficient in oral and written english and/or german ?            a quick learner who is self-driven and detail-oriented ?            can work at least 4 days/week, and continue 5-6 months preferred: ?         experience with robotics system development ?         experience with computer vision algorithms ?         experience with slam or sensor fusion working department: bosch, cr/rtc5-ap (corporate research, research and technology center, asia pacific) working location: 333 fuquan road north, changning district, shanghai important note: due to current chinese visa regulations, we can only accept chinese nationals or any person enrolled at a chinese university during the time of the internship (double-degrees, studies in p.r. china, etc.) for the position. thank you for your understanding. please send your cv or enquiries to marcpatrick.zapf at cn.bosch.com<mailto:marcpatrick.zapf at cn.bosch.com>

subject: research scientist industry 4.0 &  robotics at bosch corporate research asia-pacific (shanghai)
content: dear colleagues, we are looking to fill the position of research scientist in industry 4.0 & robotics at bosch corporate research center asia-pacific (shanghai). company description do you want beneficial technologies being shaped by your ideas? whether in the areas of mobility solutions, consumer goods, industrial technology or energy and building technology - with us, you will have the chance to improve quality of life all across the globe. welcome to bosch. job description corporate research - research and technology center asia pacific is a team of international & interdisciplinary scientists, driving cutting edge research to leverage on asia's best-in-class expertise. scientifically verified knowledge and insights are the foundation of our sustainable solutions. through our innovation, we develop a vision for the future product of bosch, evaluate its feasibility, and convert it into practical solutions. we set trends and enable new business opportunities for bosch. *         research and development of innovative industry 4.0 and automation concepts for bosch manufacturing plants in china and worldwide *         research includes but is not limited to innovative concepts for robotics control and robot-human-collaboration, safety systems, two-arm robotics, vision and robotics *         advanced development of automation use cases and systems, development of demonstrators and proof-of-concepts *         application of use cases (robotics and automation) in bosch plants in china and worldwide *         cooperation with bosch business units worldwide for requirement analysis, technology transfer, and to evaluate market attractiveness of new concepts *         scouting, identification and tracking of new trends and emerging technologies in china, derive impacts on bosch research strategy and identify key partners *         collaborate with leading chinese research institutes and participate in / lead joint projects qualifications *         excellent master degree, ideally phd, in the field of mechatronics mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, automation technology, computer science, or related *         practical experience in factory automation and robotics programming, ideally experience in computer vision *         good knowledge of robotic control and robotic operating systems *         international experience is a plus *         passion for innovation & entrepreneurial mindset *         initiative and ability to lead research projects and implementation of research results in industrial environment *         strong team player with autonomous and efficient working style *         excellent communication skills, fluent in chinese and english (oral and written) working location: 333 fuquan road north, changning district, shanghai please send your cv or enquiries to marcpatrick.zapf at cn.bosch.com<mailto:marcpatrick.zapf at cn.bosch.com>

subject: software engineer @ dorabot inc.  atlanta, us
content: we are looking for a talented and experienced software engineer! *job description* 1. implement robotics algorithms 2. integrate software parts and library to the robot system 3. maintain related functions and keep it stable * position requirement* 1. skilled with linux development environment 2. focus on code style and software engineering 3. skilled with git 4. very skilled with c++, have knowledge of new standards such as c++11, c++14, etc. should be familiar with the following functions:  - pointer and smart pointer;  - memory alignment and memory management;  - stl, boost;  - oop;  - c++ template;  - linux management tools, be able to write some simple shell scripts  - toolchain and development environment setup, be able to write and modify makefile *who we are* dorabot is an ai and robotics company developing loading, sorting, induction, and transportation solutions for market-leading logistics companies in the us and asia. headquartered in shenzhen and backed by some of the most prominent tech magnates, we're a tight-knit team of visionaries that live and breathe robotics. as e-commerce has exploded, order fulfillment still largely depends on traditional resources. dorabot's advanced solutions allow express couriers to automate, keep up with increasing demand, and fully embrace the future. unique among early-stage asian startups, dorabot employs people from over 10 different countries and views diversity as a key to their success. among dorabot?s employees are former ups executives and amazon robotics challenge champions from germany and australia. dorabot is currently piloting sorting solutions in the us, which will be rolled out to additional facilities in 2019, followed by our loading and transportation systems. our website: *www.dorabot.com subject: a number of opening positions for  postdoc fellows & phd & master on robotics in hitech, shenzhen,  china (up to 100k usd per year)
content: we are looking for a number of postdocs and ph.d. and master students to work on robotics, including: 1) cable/tendon/wire-driven flexible robots,  2) continuum/serpentine robots, 3) soft robots, 4) flexible and smart actuators,  with application to medical (like mis & rehabilitation) and industrial (like flight simulator). all qualified applicants with relevant research background are very welcome to apply. harbin institute of technology ( hitech <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__en.hitsz.edu.cn_index.htm&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=gvvi4nixribdcz1yjhlqowpqmbszdhnvb1kkvlicclu&s=p6_r5_zxxff1phwsbsxbr8lg_mfgjouofhuan040kv8&e=>  ) is a top engineering university in the world. according to the 2018 us news and world report (usnews), hitech ranked 6th in the best global universities for engineering list.  shenzhen, adjacent with hong kong, is located in the east coast of the delta of pearl river. shenzhen is thought highly as the international city, civilize city, clean city and knowledge city of china, and the garden city of the world. general requirements for postdocs:  ? ph.d. degree in robotics or mechanical or mechatronics or relevant field  ? independent research ability and leadership  ? outstanding analytical, writing and presentation skills  ? self-motivated, creative thinking, hands-on skills and teamwork salary and benefits: the candidate will be offered an attractive salary (no less than 300k yuan per year, about 45k usd) and benefits package including healthcare, accommodation, and even children education. the outstanding candidate will be titled as postdoctoral fellow, and have a highly competitive salary up to 400k yuan (about 60k usd) per year.  the candidate has a chance to exchange research at prestigious universities and institutions overseas as a visiting scholar.  the candidate can also apply for a bonus from shenzhen government, which is 320k per year during 5 years, with a total amount of 1.6 million yuan (240k usd), and tax-free. the success rate is high! general requirements for masters & phds: 1. the candidate should hold a bachelor or master degree in related majors, such as mechanical engineering, electronic engineering, medical and biological engineering, material engineering or physics.  2. the candidate should have a passion for scientific research, be capable of independent thinking with an innovative spirit.  3. the candidate (ph.d.) with publication records in international peer-reviewed journals is preferred.  4. graduates from prestigious universities and institutes are preferred.  5. at least one of the following skills and experiences is required: ? experienced in robot design, modeling and control  ? experienced in motion control system development  ? experienced in design software, such as solidworks, ansys ? experienced in matlab, ros, c programming  salary and benefits: 1. the position will be offered a full scholarship covering the tuition, accommodation and living fees.  2. all candidates will be offered a bonus commensurate with qualifications and experience. 3. the candidate has a chance for further studies, such as a joint doctoral student with overseas universities. the positions are immediately available.  outstanding candidates are welcome all over the year!  the contract for master is 2~2.5 years, for ph.d. is 3~4 years, for postdoc is 2 years.  interested candidates please send your resume (in english, french or chinese) and supporting documents to prof. yuan email: yuanhan at hit.edu.cn (cc: yuan.han.robot at gmail.com) with subject titled postdoc/phd/master application - your name.  thanks very much for your attention! -- sent from: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__robotics-2dworldwide.1046236.n5.nabble.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=gvvi4nixribdcz1yjhlqowpqmbszdhnvb1kkvlicclu&s=hpqt4ejwhgjitvtrxwutpxlshxmxya3otuxz8xcinlg&e=

subject: postdoc position on medical robots in  chinese university of hong kong (cuhk)
content: we are seeking for research assistants and postdoctoral fellows to work on innovative medical robots/instruments, including: 1) tendon/wire-driven flexible surgical robot; 2) soft medical robots; 3) magnetic actuated medical devices. all qualified applicants with relevant research background are welcome to apply. successful candidates will work in the advanced bio-medical robotics lab (https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__sites.google.com_site_lizhengrobotics_home&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=mgvmx07fqihmkq6bhldbjzo--adftuzpkgmmxdlrlru&s=iurcxkr_qvd68c9haaeoivnwkoz1j9vijqyqcioc4h4&e= (https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__www.cuhk.edu.hk_english_index.html&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=mgvmx07fqihmkq6bhldbjzo--adftuzpkgmmxdlrlru&s=7a5djy9wlhfhx4ahqnbvt--hy5ivt9c8tobmnkvmh2o&e= ).  requirements for research assistant: ?	master degree or above in robotics or mechatronics or equivalent (outstanding undergraduate student will also be considered) ?	skilled in mechanical design and mechatronics device prototyping ?	experienced in continuum robot or soft robot is preferred  ?	experience in medical robot development is preferred ?	good analytical, writing and presentation ?	experience in medical robot development is preferred ?	independent research ability and leadership ?	outstanding analytical, writing and presentation skills  ?	highly self-motivated, creative thinking, hands-on skills, team work and interpersonal skills start time: the positions are immediately available.  closing date: until the vacancies are filled. monthly salary and fringe benefits: salary will be highly competitive, commensurate with qualifications and experience. for postdoctoral fellow and research assistant, contract is typically yearly based and renewal is upon mutual agreement.  application procedure: interested candidates please send your resume and supporting documents to zheng li lizheng at cuhk.edu.hk with subject titled ?application ? position - your name?. thanks very much for your attention!  ----- zheng li -- sent from: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__robotics-2dworldwide.1046236.n5.nabble.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=mgvmx07fqihmkq6bhldbjzo--adftuzpkgmmxdlrlru&s=opasortsy_og-_80swgmtvnv6cguukcvcujjlamezks&e=

subject: postdoctoral fellow - robotics and  artificial intelligence
content: *introduction* the chinese university of hong kong, shenzhen robotics and artificial intelligence laboratory is located in shenzhen, the core engine of innovation and technology in the greater bay area, and led by academician xu yangsheng, an internationally renowned robotics and artificial intelligence expert. inheriting the research accumulation of advanced robotics laboratory of the chinese university of hong kong from 1997, it has a long-term research foundation in robotics, artificial intelligence, smart vehicle, machine vision, and human-machine interface. the scientific research results include a number of internationally renowned robots such as single-wheeled robots, tree-climbing robots, and omni-directional steering vehicles. the laboratory also has numerous advanced experimental equipment, such as unmanned surface vehicle, autonomous driving car, quadruped robot, nao, baxter, ur5, kinova, opt track motion capture system, microgravity system. the laboratory continues to expand innovation research and cooperation with the industry, and established the national-local joint engineering laboratory of robot and intelligent manufacturing, and the robot institute of cuhk (shenzhen). we are welcoming all research elites to join us. post specification research directions: ?   robotics: service robots, mobile robots, modular robots, special purpose robots, etc. ?   artificial intelligence: emotion and behavior perception, environment and situation analysis, learning-based human-computer interaction interface, etc. ?   machine vision: visual servoing, vision-based scene modeling, multi-camera multi-target tracking, etc. qualifications and requirements 1. computer science, automation, mechanical, electronic and other related professional qualifications; 2. work actively, with a strong sense of responsibility, teamwork spirit, good language expression, and communication skills; 3. experience in relevant research projects is preferred. *key duties and responsibilities:* 1. able to complete research on related topics independently and publish high-level academic papers; 2. assist in guiding the training of postgraduate students; 3. research project management; 3. assist in the declaration of various funding projects. *salary and benefits* salary will be competitive, commensurate with qualifications and experience. appointments will be made under the establishment of cuhk-sz and statutory benefits will be provided according to the prevailing labor laws applicable in the prc. the appointee will be based at the university campus in shenzhen, prc. *application procedure* please send a full curriculum vitae, supporting material together with the information of two referees by email to prof. lam, tin lun (tllam at cuhk.edu.cn) -- sent from: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__robotics-2dworldwide.1046236.n5.nabble.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=8atvljo5_768y1vy6gfgl404rthnlma7geycqvfkfa8&s=4mtuxkrexpl7wptk89gw_ucowt6t_6hxt9samgdo5r4&e=

subject: phd position in robotics and artificial  intelligence, the chinese university of hong kong, shenzhen
content: *introduction* the chinese university of hong kong, shenzhen robotics and artificial intelligence laboratory is located in shenzhen, the core engine of innovation and technology in the greater bay area, and led by academician xu yangsheng, an internationally renowned robotics and artificial intelligence expert. inheriting the research accumulation of advanced robotics laboratory of the chinese university of hong kong from 1997, it has a long-term research foundation in robotics, artificial intelligence, smart vehicle, machine vision, and human-machine interface. the scientific research results include a number of internationally renowned robots such as single-wheeled robots, tree-climbing robots, and omni-directional steering vehicles. the laboratory also has numerous advanced experimental equipment, such as unmanned surface vehicle, autonomous driving car, quadruped robot, nao, baxter, ur5, kinova, opt track motion capture system, microgravity system. the laboratory continues to expand innovation research and cooperation with the industry, and established the national-local joint engineering laboratory of robot and intelligent manufacturing, and the robot institute of cuhk (shenzhen). we are welcoming all research elites to join us. post specification research directions: ?   robotics: service robots, mobile robots, modular robots, special purpose robots, etc. ?   artificial intelligence: emotion and behavior perception, environment and situation analysis, learning-based human-computer interaction interface, etc. ?   machine vision: visual servoing, vision-based scene modeling, multi-camera multi-target tracking, etc. qualifications and requirements 1. computer science, automation, mechanical, electronic and other related professional qualifications; 2. work actively, with a strong sense of responsibility, teamwork spirit, good language expression, and communication skills; 3. experience in relevant research projects is preferred. *key duties and responsibilities:* 1. able to complete research on related topics independently and publish high-level academic papers; 2. assist in the declaration of various funding projects. *application procedure* please send a full curriculum vitae, supporting material together with the information of two referees by email to prof. lam, tin lun (tllam at cuhk.edu.cn) -- sent from: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__robotics-2dworldwide.1046236.n5.nabble.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=fzvebq8oxyoggw4pszhn1kh-eob6edigc7eo6cprwb4&s=vgwbk05wjrowodwkuky26rejqohshe0w3mwtcnpsmh8&e=

subject: multiple postdoctoral fellows in robot  manipulation at the chinese university of hong kong in-reply-to: <hk0pr01mb22283e6e552735b4d9aaeeace7b20@hk0pr01mb2228.apcprd01.prod.exchangelabs.com> references: <hk0pr01mb22283e6e552735b4d9aaeeace7b20@hk0pr01mb2228.apcprd01.prod.exchangelabs.com>
content: the chinese university of hong kong c3 robotics laboratory and centre of robotic construction & architecture are looking for multiple postdoctoral fellows in the are of robotic manipulation: - project 1: robotic building construction - project 2: musculoskeletal robot development and control - project 3: reconfigurable cable-driven and tensegrity robots the appointee will work closely with dr. darwin lau and his team within the department of mechanical and automation engineering. work duties include: development of robots for the problems within the project, prototype and testing, project management and assistance in supervision of other team members. applicants should possess a phd degree in the area of robotics or related discipline. experience with practical robotic systems, mechanism design, development of automation solutions and algorithms in the analysis and control of robotic systems are desired. the position is on a one/two-year fixed-term basis with the possibility of renewal. a highly competitive salary, commensurate with qualifications and experience, will be offered in addition to annual leave, medical benefits and university contribution to a retirement benefits scheme. hong kong is an vibrant international city and is accommodating to english speakers. applicants should send an up-to-date cv, information on previous projects and reference/recommendation letters (if available) to darwinlau at cuhk.edu.hk. project information: ----------------------------------------- project 1 - robotic construction: development of robotic systems dedicated for the use of automated construction and architecture. the focus of the position would be on the fundamental and practical development of new robotic systems, through the use of cable-driven and robot manipulators, which can increase productivity, increase safety and expand the implementation and design opportunities of building structures. examples of related projects include, "cu-brick: automated brick construction cable-driven robot", "robots for exterior facade operations of high-rise buildings", "automated interior renovation robot systems" and "robotic production of modular integrated construction components". project 2 - musculoskeletal robot development and control: development of hardware platforms, analysis tools and algorithms for cable-driven/muscle-driven robots that mimic human body parts. this includes pure robotic systems or human/cadaver robotic systems. applications of this work relate to biomechanics, orthopaedic surgery, rehabilitation and prosthetic. project 3 - reconfigurable cable-driven and tensegrity robots: this project focuses on the design analysis and prototype development of cable-driven and tensegrity robots where it can reconfigure, whether it is the attachment locations at the base frame, end-effector, or even the changes in the topology of the base frame and end-effector. the goal of this work is to conduct fundamental analysis that transfers to practical applications, such as for building construction, under-water deploy-able robots or robots for inspection of public utilities. -------------------- darwin lau, phd director, cuhk centre of robotic construction and architecture assistant professor, department of mechanical and automation engineering the chinese university of hong kong shatin, new territories, hong kong tel: 39438523, fax: 26036002 email: darwinlau at cuhk.edu.hk

subject: software engineer @ dorabot inc.  atlanta, us
content: we aim to gather the smartest robot enthusiasts to build a fully autonomous robot that can see and operate in the human environment, bring a true robotic future to life. now, we are looking for a talented and experienced software engineer based in atlanta, us. *job description* 1. implement robotics algorithms 2. integrate software parts and library to the robot system 3. maintain related functions and keep it stable * position requirement* 1. skilled with linux development environment 2. focus on code style and software engineering 3. skilled with git 4. very skilled with c++, have knowledge of new standards such as c++11, c++14, etc. should be familiar with the following functions:  - pointer and smart pointer;  - memory alignment and memory management;  - stl, boost;  - oop;  - c++ template;  - linux management tools, be able to write some simple shell scripts  - toolchain and development environment setup, be able to write and modify makefile *who we are* dorabot is an ai and robotics company developing loading, sorting, induction, and transportation solutions for market-leading logistics companies in the us and asia. headquartered in shenzhen and backed by some of the most prominent tech magnates, we're a tight-knit team of visionaries that live and breathe robotics. as e-commerce has exploded, order fulfillment still largely depends on traditional resources. dorabot's advanced solutions allow express couriers to automate, keep up with increasing demand, and fully embrace the future. unique among early-stage asian startups, dorabot employs people from over 10 different countries and views diversity as a key to their success. among dorabot?s employees are former ups executives and amazon robotics challenge champions from germany and australia. dorabot is currently piloting sorting solutions in the us, which will be rolled out to additional facilities in 2019, followed by our loading and transportation systems. our website: *www.dorabot.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__www.dorabot.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=oku5ekddmnav33h937tgscsvegm7szmd9hthnm8xqik&s=y-kebiq9txsvb7lgyulutuczt_ipv3qvuvugeboqa2w&e=>* subject: international faculty recruitment  activities at the icra, montreal, canada (zhejiang university)
content: international faculty recruitment activities at the icra, montreal, canada faculty positions in the college of control science & engineering during the icra 2019, may 20-24, 2019 montreal, canada, we have three professors from the college of control science & engineering, zhejiang university will be available for discussing various faculty positions. please feel free to contact profs. yong liu (yong.liu at zju.edu.cn, wechat:13805719977, phone:+86-13805719977), weimin wu (wmwu at zju.edu.cn, wechat:13758229727, phone:+86-13758229727), chao xu (cxu at zju.edu.cn; wechat: 53295319, phone:+86-13706711953) to make an appointment.may 20-24, 2019 montreal, canada the college of control science and engineering at zhejiang university invites applications for all ranks of professor positions as well as postdoc fellows, in the broad areas including but not limited to:  **robotics and intelligent unmanned systems  **industrial intelligence and optimization control  **cyber security, safety for industrial control systems  **smart sensing and measurement applicants are required to earn a phd degree in an appropriate engineering or science ?eld. for each category of the positions, applicants should send an application package with a cover letter, resume, statement of teaching, statement of research and a list of references (at least three) to the hr of?ce of the college at *** wangjiaolong at zju.edu.cn (mr. jiaolong wang)***. please include postal address, phone number and email address of each reference in the application package. this announcement remains effective until positions are ?lled. we will provide internationally highly competitive salary and research facilities. zhejiang university (zju) is one of china?s top higher education institutions, as well as one of its oldest; its roots can be traced back to 1897 and the founding of the qiushi academy. zju currently ranks among the top three on chinese mainland and within the top 70 in the times higher education world reputation rankings (#67 in 2018) and qs world university rankings (#68 in 2018). eighteen disciplines of zju have been selected for china?s double first-class initiative (3rd in china) and 39 disciplines graded a in the recent national assessment (1st in china). in the engineering ?eld, zju is ranked #19 globally in the 2018 arwu world university rankings in the ?eld of automation & control.

subject: postdoc position in robotics - shanghai  jiao tong university, china
content: we are seeking several full-time postdoctoral research assistants to join the intelligent robot research team at shanghai jiao tong university (sjtu) on the topics including, but not limited to, visual servoing, soft robotics, autonomous driving and deep learning. shanghai jiao tong university, established in 1896, is one of the top 5 best universities in china, ranking 59th in the world according to qs world university rankings and 145th at us news rankings. the university has 42 doctoral degree programs covering 8 disciplines, including economics, law, literature, science, engineering, agriculture, medicine and management. there are 57 master's degree programs covering 12 disciplines, 23 professional master degree authorization centers and 35 postdoctoral stations.   we team will provide the candidate with advanced facilities for the research and development of robotics. the mission of the research team is to conduct the basic research related to mobile robot, robotic manipulators, collective robotics and computer vision, etc., and to explore novel applications of robot technologies in medical service, health care, energy industry, aerospace engineering, etc.  the candidate will decide the topic according to his/her aptitude inclination and personal research background. he/she will work on the one of following topics: the development of robust control method for visual servoing; the design, modeling and control of soft robot; joint unsupervised learning method for depth and visual odometer. the candidate will be responsible for the development and implementation of novel algorithms and their implementations to enable a robust and intelligent control of soft robot or autonomous robot system. the candidate will have the opportunity to contribute in collaborative projects with other national/global institutes and communicate with other universities. interested candidates are encouraged to contact pro. hesheng wang at wanghesheng at sjtu.edu.cn, with detail resume attached.

subject: multiple robot and a.i. project  internship positions at smst (xi'an, china)
content: the school of marine science and technology (smst, a department of northwestern polytechnical university, xi?an, china) is focused on the scientific research and talents cultivation in marine information processing, underwater vehicle, marine engineering fields. now smst is looking for a highly motivated intern to work on developing algorithms for robot control, deep reinforcement learning and swarm intelligence. successful candidate will collaborate with smst researchers to design, analyze, and implement new algorithms, conduct experiments, and prepare results for publication. the candidate should have a strong background in data fusion, machine learning and robotics. prior experience of working with robotic systems is required. the candidate should be comfortable implementing the developed algorithms in python and should have prior experience working with ros. prior exposure to deep learning and hands-on experience with packages such as pytorch and/or tensorflow is expected. the candidate is expected to be a master/phd student in computer science, electrical engineering, operations research, statistics, applied mathematics, or a related field, with relevant publication record. expected duration of the internship is at least 3 months. the position is expected to be available starting late july. interested candidates are encouraged to apply with their recent cv with list of related publications and links to github repositories (if any). we can afford:1.      living expenses.2.      accommodation fees.3.      international trip costs.  if you have questions, please contact me at feihu.zhang at nwpu.edu.cn or feihu.zhang at tum.de   -- asso. prof. dr. feihu zhang school of marine science and technology northwestern polytechnical university 127?youyi west road?xi'an?shaanxxi?china

subject: multiple postdoctoral positions  available at smst (xi'an, china)
content: the school of marine science and technology (smst, a department of northwestern polytechnical university, xi?an, china) is focused on the scientific research and talents cultivation in marine information processing, underwater vehicle, marine engineering fields. smst warmly welcomes overseas researchers to apply postdoctoral positions in robotics and a.i., navigation, image processing& recognizing and other related disciplines. notice that the positions would start as soon as possible. salary will be competitive, commensurate with qualifications and experience.successful candidate will collaborate with smst researchers to design, analyze, and implement new algorithms, conduct experiments, and prepare results for publication. the candidate should have a strong background in data fusion, machine learning and robotics domains. the position would be guaranteed for at least two year, with possible for one year extension.apply, the following documents are needed for applications:  - a motivation letter  - a detailed cv  - email addresses of at least two references    if you have questions, please contact me at feihu.zhang at nwpu.edu.cn or feihu.zhang at tum.de   -- asso. prof. dr. feihu zhang school of marine science and technology northwestern polytechnical university 127?youyi west road?xi'an?shaanxxi?china

the autonomy and intelligence of uavs. topics include object detection and tracking, slam, autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance, and aggressive uav flights. we offer a very competitive salary subject: aeolus robotics: robot software  engineer (planning/scheduling/knowledge-engineering)
content: aeolus robotics inc. ( www.aeolusbot.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__www.aeolusbot.com&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=x8jbflkknzelnmgwsqf7dr2pbpfbztrui0bgg_o1724&s=en7pobt43lem2huknoqdjicr1kkh7ddozhzlgepn650&e= >  ) is a start-up robotics company. we are looking for a driven robotics software engineers who are hands-on, technical, and passionate about robotics. we are looking for the robot software engineer to develop high-level robot task planners and schedulers and work directly on robots to execute tasks. you will be responsible for: * implementing and integrating algorithms that are applicable for high-level robot task planning and scheduling. * creating c++ api interfaces, developing and fine-tuning optimization and scheduling tools. * develop new, or integrate readily available solutions for, high-level robot task planning and scheduling. * develop new, or integrate readily available solutions for high-level robotics knowledge-modeling, case-based, rule-based, and knowledge-based semantic reasoning. * search for and integrate, implement tools for cognitive robotics, knowledge acquisition systems, decision-support systems, expert-systems, which support robot task planning and scheduling. * develop integrated robotic planning and execution use cases on real robotic platforms. you will work in a scrum-based agile development cycle. you will be working alongside founders, researchers, and engineers to design and build first-generation robotic solutions for mass consumer adoption. you will be measured by deliverables, engineering oriented approach, code quality, real robot integration quality and ability to communicate with peers and work in a team. experience: * bs in me/ee/cs with robotics focus. * at least 5 years in software development, and two 2 years working in robotics (or related) field. mandatory requirements: experience in: * robot task planning techniques. * scheduling algorithms. * stochastic optimization methods. * heuristic solvers. * knowledge-modeling. * semantic reasoning. * ontologies. * rule-based systems. preferred requirements: * experience in working hands-on with robots, created solutions for industrial, service robotics usage. place of work / form of cooperation: * remote, wroclaw, taipei or vienna. * availability to travel up to 25% of working time. * contract work or a permanent position: we can accommodate you. more about us: aeolus robotics was founded to bring the first generation of household robot assistants to life, and to market. integrating prowess from world-leading taiwanese manufacturers with silicon valley ai genius, we are breaking ground in general-purpose consumer robotics with capability in unstructured ?human? spaces. check our website for more, and search the web for "aeolus robot" to find some of the many articles and videos about our prototype demonstrations. we invite top-notch people with a passion for robotics to join us in this technical adventure. among our many open positions ( subject: aeolus robotics: simulation engineer  for manipulation and grasping
content: *aeolus robotics inc.* ( www.aeolusbot.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__www.aeolusbot.com&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=rhjcnrfsktmvwn8rapmuqqjmc7j-fxe4z5esscrztwq&s=mqb0skrvcqbz94_ybsfxcmjnfiih0_bkbeaniul5sh4&e= >  ) is a start-up robotics company. we are looking for a *simulation engineer for manipulation and grasping*. you will be responsible for arm trajectory planning in simulation and transfer to real robot. you will work on arm path planning, tuning urdf and simulation code. * arm trajectory planning with collision avoidance. * restricted trajectory planning: keeping gripper orientation and approach along straight path. * transfer of simulated trajectories as similar as possible to real arm movements (incorporating visual servoing if used). * maintenance and improvements of urdf. * grasp planning: calculate gripper position for grasping dependent on:   - object mesh   - object specific grasp   - gripper model   - gripper specific approach direction * solving ik problems: by base positioning or strategies for requirement relaxation for trajectory calculation. * arm trajectory and grasp planning for two-armed robot. you will work in a scrum-based agile development cycle. you will be working alongside founders, researchers, and engineers to design and build first-generation robotic solutions for mass consumer adoption. *experience:* * phd or 2+ years professional experience in field of arm trajectory planning * 3+ years of experience in robotics simulation (e.g. moveit, ompl, ode, bullet, gazebo, v-rep...). * experience with trajectory planning for robot arm and grippers with collision avoidance. * good knowledge of ros. *preferred requirements:* * 3+ years experience with robotics simulation for object grasping. * hands-on experience in robotics and good technical knowledge * theoretical background in forward/inverse kinematics, force/form closure. *place of work / form of cooperation:* * the aeolus grasping core team is located in vienna, austria and is hence the preferred place of employment. employment at our other locations in taipei or wroclaw (poland) or remote would also be possible, as long as sufficient evaluation on the robot can be achieved. * contract work or a permanent position: we can accommodate you. *more about us:* aeolus robotics was founded to bring the first generation of household robot assistants to life, and to market. integrating prowess from world-leading taiwanese manufacturers with silicon valley ai genius, we are breaking ground in general-purpose consumer robotics with capability in unstructured ?human? spaces. check our website for more, and search the web for "aeolus robot" to find some of the many articles and videos about our prototype demonstrations. we invite top-notch people with a passion for robotics to join us in this technical adventure. among our many open positions ( https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__careers.aeolusbot.com&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=rhjcnrfsktmvwn8rapmuqqjmc7j-fxe4z5esscrztwq&s=-z82r_hapxa4qr_modewojhiodisiqn1ibafrmkoshs&e= subject: postdoc, ph.d.,  and ra positions in robotics & ai, cuhk-sz
content: *introduction* the chinese university of hong kong (shenzhen) robotics and artificial intelligence laboratory (https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__crai.cuhk.edu.cn&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=4yzst4yx0cmjppuiaax_3iyjz1bljnwc-ximkat8qfm&s=oxhlvv1oib_vn_f6auxrdl_du7ib6xczf0dtcehhen8&e= ) is located in shenzhen, the core engine of innovation and technology in the greater bay area, and led by academician xu yangsheng, ieee fellow, internationally renowned robotics and artificial intelligence expert. inheriting the research accumulation of advanced robotics laboratory of the chinese university of hong kong from 1997, it has a long-term research foundation in robotics, artificial intelligence, smart vehicle, machine vision, and human-machine interface. the scientific research results include a number of internationally renowned robots such as single-wheeled robots, tree-climbing robots, and omnidirectional steering vehicles. the laboratory also has numerous advanced experimental equipment, such as unmanned surface vehicle, autonomous driving car, quadruped robot, nao, baxter, ur5, kinova, opt track motion capture system, microgravity system. the laboratory continues to expand innovation research and cooperation with the industry, and established the national-local joint engineering laboratory of robot and intelligent manufacturing, and the robot institute of cuhk (shenzhen). we are welcoming all research elites to join us. *position* postdoctoral fellow, ph.d. candidate, research assistant *research directions* ?   robotics: service robots, mobile robots, modular robots, soft robots, etc. ?   ai: emotion, behavior, and environment perception and prediction, navigation and manipulation, multi-robot cooperation, human-computer interface, etc. *qualifications and requirements* 1. computer science, automation, mechanical, electronic and other related professional qualifications; 2. work actively, with a strong sense of responsibility, teamwork spirit, good language expression, and communication skills; 3. experience in relevant research projects is preferred. (more detail about ph.d. programme: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__sse-2dmphil-2dphd.cuhk.edu.cn_en_basic_281&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=4yzst4yx0cmjppuiaax_3iyjz1bljnwc-ximkat8qfm&s=1ccz3ctjsb03cn11vndrhxcdkcdk7kq3ebih7jancwq&e= ) *key duties and responsibilities* 1. able to complete research on related topics independently and publish high-level academic papers; 2. assist in accomplishing research projects; 3. assist in the declaration of various funding projects. *salary and benefits* salary will be competitive, commensurate with qualifications and experience. appointments will be made under the establishment of cuhk-sz and statutory benefits will be provided according to the prevailing labor laws applicable in the prc. the appointee will be based at the university campus in shenzhen, prc. *application procedure* please send a full curriculum vitae, supporting material together with the information of two referees by email to prof. lam, tin lun (tllam at cuhk.edu.cn). (more about prof. lam, tin lun: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__myweb.cuhk.edu.cn_tllam&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=4yzst4yx0cmjppuiaax_3iyjz1bljnwc-ximkat8qfm&s=a1eauh6iouc3uquibv_hfyco5lofl1zozpy0caefmy8&e= ) -- sent from: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__robotics-2dworldwide.1046236.n5.nabble.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=4yzst4yx0cmjppuiaax_3iyjz1bljnwc-ximkat8qfm&s=ddw8eh9hjjrjmbfk6q786u-crnmayan3ohtmgsdcdwq&e=

subject: ph.d. positions at ntnu in taiwan
content: phd student positions application deadline: 15th july 2019 program start date: 1st september 2019 overview the educational robotics center at national taiwan normal university has openings for three ph.d. students in the areas of intelligent robotics, such as    1.    programming by demonstration    2.    explainable ai for self-driving cars    3.    humanoid robot athletes the positions are funded through full scholarships from national taiwan normal university (ntnu) and the taiwanese ministry for science and technology (most). the scholarship includes a stipend of $40,000 ntd per month. requirements potential candidates must have a strong academic background including successful completion of a thesis-based m.sc. or similar degree at an accredited university. candidates must have demonstrated academic aptitude through previous publications including academic papers,  thesis, or project reports. previous experience in large projects or participation at the federation of international robot sports association <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__www.firaworldcup.org&d=dwmfaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=oztfnn5evegrab9upcdrfi9xamlpkmnxt-2s4hqlwoq&s=nt_tg1zt4oa5qnzwsf6mvtjsrab1mkefkczr52cores&e=> (fira) or robocup <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__www.robocup.org&d=dwmfaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=oztfnn5evegrab9upcdrfi9xamlpkmnxt-2s4hqlwoq&s=a-rbqvdn0tudmszj9y8rlyuvzxguqxd7dyqv7k_0nru&e=> robot competitions is a plus. all candidates must possess strong practical skills in the areas of general programming, especially using ros <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__www.ros.org&d=dwmfaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=oztfnn5evegrab9upcdrfi9xamlpkmnxt-2s4hqlwoq&s=9wjs637bfxjuuwk-y-gugwovjnvrst0uymtm6ejwm80&e=> . educational robotics center the educational robotics center (erc) at ntnu is guided by prof. jacky baltes <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__scholar.google.com.tw_citations-3fuser-3d557qr3kaaaaj-26hl-3den&d=dwmfaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=oztfnn5evegrab9upcdrfi9xamlpkmnxt-2s4hqlwoq&s=0tnjcuq4p7mrtza-yhgpxcgsbm3cejkqfkqvewez9ji&e=>. the research group focuses on the development of robot athletes for various sports. prof. baltes? team is an experienced team and has successfully competed at various robot competitions. the erc is an international research lab, which currently includes about 20 researchers from brazil, canada, germany, india, indonesia, iran, south korea, taiwan, thailand, and   vietnam  . courses and research are conducted in english. the erc maintains collaborations with many other research labs world-wide. national taiwan normal university the national taiwan normal university is one of the best universities in taiwan and has a world class reputation (22nd in qs university world ranking <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__en.ntnu.edu.tw_news-2dshow.php-3fid-3d11955&d=dwmfaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=oztfnn5evegrab9upcdrfi9xamlpkmnxt-2s4hqlwoq&s=8o0igysgrt17w2qsqbmtcrnd2z8juidfbzy7ou2aguu&e=>) in education. it was initially a teachers? college (hence normal university), but has expanded in recent years to be a full university including colleges for science, engineering, arts, and humanities. ntnu has approximately 17,000 students with about 1,800 foreign students. ntnu is also the host of the mandarin chinese teaching center, one of the best schools for learning mandarin chinese. the main campus of ntnu, where erc is located, is in the da?an district of taipei. taiwan. taipei is a modern and vibrant city with great food and an exciting environment that combines asian and western culture. taiwan is also the main manufacturing hub for advanced electronics and includes headquarters of many multinational technology powerhouses such as nvidia, google, microsoft, mediatek, asus, acer, foxconn, garmin, and giant. application procedure to apply for one of these positions or for further information about the erc, please contact prof. jacky baltes via email jacky.baltes at ntnu.edu.tw before the deadline 15th july 2019. --  prof. jacky baltes, skype, twitter, telegram: jacky.baltes national taiwan normal university 162 heping e. rd., sec. 1, taipei 10610, taiwan tel: +886 -2-7734-3634 email: jacky.baltes at ntnu.edu.tw

subject: posdoc funding available  | soft robotics | shanghai jiao tong university references: <camazovrhsg9mxafxdxsw9bw=foc3rxzr=vmwoqn=bghvc0pucw@mail.gmail.com>,   <2018101915130668233135@sjtu.edu.cn>
content: dear all, there is a funded postdoc position (2-3 years) at soft robotics and biodesign lab (https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__softrobotics.sjtu.edu.cn_&d=dwigoq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=e4t6ak-emugibjqbfubjmoc5trclfmbaeuipwd4ijnu&s=ecwvd0cwrcxjnjckmcx225pnzbbbyflc1f5p9bc7oxa&e=  ), robotics institute, school of mechanical engineering, shanghai jiao tong university (sjtu), shanghai, china. we have a soft robotic project on developing  wearable and assistive  soft robots for assisting and restoring the ability of the humans with the upper extremity weakness in activities of daily living.    we seek two post-doctoral researchers who are interested in working with our team and have the experiences in the research areas of design, modeling, control, or manufacturing of soft robotics. the candidate should have: phd degree, excellent academic track record with publications, excellent written and communication skills (in english) and the ability to work in a collaborative team. if the candidates have the good backgrounds of deep learning, we are also very interesting.    shanghai jiao tong university (sjtu), as one of the higher education institutions which enjoy a long history and a world-renowned reputation in china, is a key university directly under the administration of the ministry of education (moe) of the people's republic of china and co-constructed by moe and shanghai municipal government. through more than 120 years' unremitting efforts, sjtu has become a comprehensive, research-oriented, and internationalized top university in china.   if you are interesting in this position, please email me (guguoying at sjtu.edu.cn) your resume, cover letter describing research interests and goals, copies of up to three relevant research papers, as well as the information of three references (expected to provide recommendation letters for the next steps). the post will be open until filled.   all the best,   guoying gu, ph.d. professor soft robotics and biodesign lab robotics institute, school of mechanical engineering shanghai jiao tong university 800 dong chuan road, shanghai 200240, china email: guguoying at sjtu.edu.cn; web: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__softrobotics.sjtu.edu.cn_&d=dwigoq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=e4t6ak-emugibjqbfubjmoc5trclfmbaeuipwd4ijnu&s=ecwvd0cwrcxjnjckmcx225pnzbbbyflc1f5p9bc7oxa&e=

subject: senior computer vision engineer/ lead  computer vision engineer- dorabot inc.
content: dorabot is expanding and hiring for new positions! join us in revolutionizing  robotics by applying cutting-edge technology to real world scenarios.  *senior computer vision engineer/ lead computer vision engineer*  1. work with both 2d (rgb) and 3d (depth) raw perception data. 2. solve vision tasks including but not limited to the following: - vision sensor calibration (internal and external) - identifying and classifying objects, generating bounding boxes, segmenting objects, and generating object masks - measuring object sizes - estimating and tracking object poses - learning/scanning new objects quickly with surface reconstruction - identifying and reading barcodes - large-scale automatic data collection - efficient and autonomous data labeling - vision-based mapping, localization, and navigation 3. program robots to perform the tasks listed above in various lighting conditions, with heavy occlusion, while robots/cameras are moving at high speeds. 4. the job might involve researching particular topics, reading papers, attending conferences, efficiently implementing algorithms for hardware, testing, debugging, parallelization, sourcing sensors and computing platforms, writing documents/papers, and generating patents. position requirements	 1. background in computer vision, computer graphics, image processing, machine learning or other related fields, phd is preferred 2. very skilled in c++ and python (knowledge and daily experience) 3. solid knowledge of computer vision with experience of turning theories into practical programs. 4. very skilled with vision libraries: opencv, pcl, etc. 5. very skilled with deep learning frameworks: tensor flow, keras, etc. 6. skilled with machine learning techniques, especially deep learning, reinforcement learning, and transfer learning. preferred qualifications	 1. published author in computer vision and graphics journals and attended conferences such as cvpr, iccv, siggraph, etc. 2. experienced in programming, robotics, or vision algorithm challenges, e.g. ilsvrc 3. strong experience in any of the following areas: - image detection and segmentation - scene comprehension - image captioning - video analysis - multi-object pose estimation - rgb-d segmentation - 3d reconstruction - motion tracking - large-scale datasets creation - multi-cluster gpu training - open source project collaboration - blogging/writing about computer vision or robotics here?s a bit about our company:  dorabot is an ai and robotics company developing loading, sorting,  induction, and  transportation solutions for market-leading logistics companies in the us  and china. headquartered in shenzhen and backed by some of china's most  prominent tech magnates, we're a tight-knit team of visionaries that live  and breathe robotics.  as e-commerce has exploded, order fulfillment still largely depends on  traditional  resources. dorabot's advanced solutions allow express couriers to automate,  keep up with increasing demand, and fully embrace the future.  unique among early-stage chinese startups, dorabot employs people from over  10  different countries and views diversity as a key to their success. among  dorabot?s  employees are former ups executives and amazon robotics challenge champions  from germany and australia.  dorabot is currently piloting sorting solutions in the us, which will be  rolled out to  additional facilities in 2019, followed by our loading and transportation  systems.  our website: www.dorabot.com  what we offer:  -a competitive salary and company equity based on experience and personal  contributions  -an amazing opportunity to experience life in shenzhen, widely known as  china?s silicon valley. shenzhen has the best air quality of any major city  in china!  -free chinese lessons  -free lunches and fresh fruit  -an international workplace where english is our working language  -on-site company gym  -plenty of resources to purchase all kinds of equipment for research and  development  *dorabot videos:*  dorabot solution compilation video - https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__youtu.be_3-2dr9gbgq-2dds&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=kgrhwodzsadebg_kjfkvzm0ph6tuzffhnjj6b0d6v9a&s=x1fxg1pf-nscyxcv5drv7ffyhza6uhtpxlzp7iitv_g&e= a short video we put together showcasing our various solutions and  technologies for dhl?s robotics day event in germany.  dorabot rewind 2018: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__www.youtube.com_watch-3fv-3dzop88u-2dnrlk&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=kgrhwodzsadebg_kjfkvzm0ph6tuzffhnjj6b0d6v9a&s=l9nev45wmqclayxab0gwqsu3x_6ktowocav2awbqjae&e= -- sent from: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__robotics-2dworldwide.1046236.n5.nabble.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=m66anz4mku4chnz1-abwjuqwgfqqftcjmyjoxd7qvf4&s=liwum7pvrxgpump-sdagrr-jsyjkpedpzmikg9nok0g&e=

subject: several phd/postdoc positions available  in resilient/intelligent control of grounded/aerial mobile robots
content: dear colleagues, the networked robotic systems laboratory (nrsl) at national cheng kung university (ncku), tainan, taiwan, is seeking applications for several ph.d. students and postdoc research associates in the area of resilient/intelligent control of grounded/aerial mobile robot. candidates with the background in automatic control, robotics, dynamical system theory, and/or applied mechatronics will receive special consideration. the successful candidates will have a competitive stipend and benefit, which are yearly based and can be automatically renewed if the candidate's performance is satisfactory. for ph.d. students, the successful candidates will receive a scholarship and research assistantship including a tuition waiver and a graduate student stipend. areas of interest include: - resilient control for multiple aerial robots coordination/manipulation - human-aware cooperation control for heterogeneous mobile robots - bio-inspired dynamic control for multiple aerial robots - resilient and intelligent control for cooperation of multiple mobile manipulators required qualifications: - relevant degree in mechanical, electrical engineering, robotics, mathematics, or related area, - strong background in dynamics, automatic control, and robotics, - strong programming skills in c/c++, matlab, ros, python, and - proficient oral and written english skills. to apply, contact prof. liu (yliu at mail.ncku.edu.tw) with a single pdf file including: - cover letter describing background and motivation, - cv including 3 references, - transcripts and diplomas of the applicant's bachelor, master, and/or doctoral studies, and - summary of the research plan. closing date for applications: *15 september 2019* or until all positions are filled. starting date: 1 october 2019 (postdoc), 1 february 2020 (phd students) dr. yen-chen liu department of mechanical engineering national cheng kung university 1 university road, tainan 70101, taiwan tel: +886-6-2757575 ext. 62120 e-mail: yliu at mail.ncku.edu.tw web: https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__myweb.ncku.edu.tw_-7eyliu&d=dwibaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=njj4vbaehglhre-semhdry8jb8p4gp_voiivp2m5jqa&s=babvdpvncny66vbqrsztyzedzxlaww7yksnipqzsdmm&e=

subject: computer vision engineer: object pose  estimation. dorabot.
content: we aim to gather the smartest robot enthusiasts to build a fully autonomous robot that can see and operate in the human environment, bring a true robotic future to life. for this position, we are looking for a talented software engineer with a deep background in vision and robot perception. *job description* 1. work with both 2d (rgb) and 3d (depth) raw perception data, sometimes even with other sensors who provides other modalities of percepts of the world. 2. solving vision tasks include but not limited to: ? vision sensor calibration (internal and external) ? identify and classify objects, generate bounding boxes, segment objects/ generate object masks ? measure object size in physical unit ? estimate and tracking object pose ? learn/ scan new objects in short time, possibly with surface reconstruction ? identify and read barcodes ? large-scale automatic data collection ? efficient (even autonomous) data labeling ? vision-based mapping, localization, and navigation 3. perform these tasks (if applicable) efficiently and robustly, against various lighting conditions/ under heavy occlusion/ while the relative pose between camera and object are changing as high speed/ multiple objects at the same time/ multiple cameras at the same time/ across different sensors/ deploy them on real robot hardware etc. 4. work on challenging scenarios such as the partially observable, sequential, dynamic, continuous, and unstructured environment. 5. the job might involve researching on a particular topic, reading papers, attending conferences, efficiently implementing algorithms on hardware, testing in the real environment, debugging, parallelization, sourcing sensors, and computing platforms, writing documents/ papers, generating patents, and other possible forms. * position requirement* 1. background in computer vision, computer graphics, image processing, machine learning or other related fields 2. proficient with c++ and python (knowledge and daily experience) 3. solid knowledge of computer vision theory with past experience of turning those theories into a robust program. 4. proficient with vision library: opencv, pcl, etc. 5. proficient in deep learning frameworks: tensor flow, keras, etc. 6. skilled with machine learning techniques, especially deep learning, reinforcement learning and transfer learning. *who we are* dorabot is an ai and robotics company developing loading, sorting, induction, and transportation solutions for market-leading logistics companies in the us and asia. headquartered in shenzhen and backed by some of the most prominent tech magnates, we're a tight-knit team of visionaries that live and breathe robotics. as e-commerce has exploded, order fulfillment still largely depends on traditional resources. dorabot's advanced solutions allow express couriers to automate, keep up with increasing demand, and fully embrace the future. unique among early-stage asian startups, dorabot employs people from over 10 different countries and views diversity as a key to their success. among dorabot?s employees are former ups executives and amazon robotics challenge champions from germany and australia. dorabot is currently piloting sorting solutions in the us, which will be rolled out to additional facilities in 2019, followed by our loading and transportation systems. our website: *www.dorabot.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3a__www.dorabot.com_&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=ytuu718g3oehz-qldhofcxqnjqzpgc0ypuzqpojuzto&s=drpxgg83pmpqvjq29g_4l2-jbr7a0-cpx4oihf5mftm&e= >* dorabot solution compilation video - *https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__youtu.be_3-2dr9gbgq-2dds&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=ytuu718g3oehz-qldhofcxqnjqzpgc0ypuzqpojuzto&s=-p2d1s630lgs6b13zr8evak8lcs72vu_duk-rs3hdhm&e= >* a short video we put together showcasing our various solutions and technologies for dhl?s robotics day event in germany. life at dorabot: employee interviews: *https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3a__www.youtube.com_watch-3fv-3d57-5fvom0w-5fcy&d=dwifaq&c=clk7kqutwtaveovigvi0nu5bouhhpn0h8p7csfnc_gi&r=0w3solp5fswiywf2rl6rss8mcefamfepafdtohgtfyi&m=ytuu718g3oehz-qldhofcxqnjqzpgc0ypuzqpojuzto&s=ic02yfrhs2fxsu_f9ltkoytuzcwohp-3vwe3n3jyrl4&e=
